page.title: 20Contributor's Page
page.content:
The following people contributed to the twenty pages of text:
Lisa Matthews, Catherine Iles, Melanie Wilkins, Lorna Wilkins, Grace Carter, Kevin Ludkin, Nor Alisa Dalton, Michelle Stevens, Rhodri Dixon, Lisa Hayward, Ben Webber, Peter Ross, Andrew Wright, Nicolas Rathbone, Peter Turner, Rebecca Bradley, Andrew Cole, David Evans, Adam Iles, Linda Lines, Julie Satchell, David Rudd, Nicholas Handy and Mr S.J.Connolly.
All the above mentioned, with the exception of Mr Connolly, were members of Class III, Hilmarton County Primary School, during the Summer Term 1985.
